info.name: Reviews
info.description: # Products Reviews - Endpoints for managing and retrieving product reviews This collection enables Users to view and post reviews for a particular Union Fashion product ## Prerequisites You are required to select the active environment ProductReviews {{EnvironmentName}}, For Example, if the collection is being operated on at the pre-implementation or prototyping stage, the environment selected would be ProductReviews Mock.

item.description: This folder enables Users to view and post reviews for A specific product of Union Fashion Apparel
